005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021
022/**
023 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
024 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-contains">fn:contains</a>
025 * function.
026 */
027public final class FnContains {
028  // CPD-OFF
029  @NonNull
030  private static final String NAME = "contains";
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextDependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("arg1").type(IStringItem.class)
040          .zeroOrOne()
041          .build())
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("arg2")
044          .type(IStringItem.class)
045          .zeroOrOne()
046          .build())
047      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
048      .returnOne()
049      .functionHandler(FnContains::execute)
050      .build();
051  // CPD-ON
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
054  @NonNull
055  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
056      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
057      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
058      IItem focus) {
059    IStringItem arg1 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
060
061    IStringItem arg2 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true));
062
063    return ISequence.of(IBooleanItem.valueOf(
064        fnContains(
065            arg1 == null ? "" : arg1.asString(),
066            arg2 == null ? "" : arg2.asString())));
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Determine if the string provided in the first argument contains the string in
071   * the second argument as a substring.
072   * <p>
073   * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
074   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-contains">fn:contains</a>
075   * function.
076   *
077   * @param arg1
078   *          the string to examine
079   * @param arg2
080   *          the string to check as the leading substring
081   * @return {@code true} if {@code arg1} contains {@code arg2}, or {@code false}
082   *         otherwise
083   */
084  public static boolean fnContains(@NonNull String arg1, @NonNull String arg2) {
085    boolean retval;
086    if (arg2.isEmpty()) {
087      retval = true;
088    } else if (arg1.isEmpty()) {
089      retval = false;
090    } else {
091      retval = arg1.contains(arg2);
092    }
093    return retval;
094  }
095
096  private FnContains() {
097    // disable construction
098  }
099}
